sources.name: RentalFourthCoffeeSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceName') ~> RentalFourthCoffeeSource

sources.name: VanArsdelRentals
sources.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArsdelRentals

sinks.name: RentalsSink
sinks.script:
RentalFourthCoffeeSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RentalsSink
